categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic repulsorcraft

nodes.text: Transport speeder, jokingly called chariots by the ground crew who operated them, were repulsorlift crafts used by the Galactic Republic and the Alliance to Restore the Republic as personnel carriers. They notably carried starfighter pilots from their waiting rooms to their waiting ships. Open on all sides, those speeders were able to seat two rows of personnel back to back, and required one operator.
